basics.name: Bryan Roa Molina
basics.label: System Ingenier | Developer | FrontEnd | Database | SCRUM | HelpDesk II
basics.summary: Systems Engineer, passionate about web application development and the incredible world of databases. I constantly seek challenges that allow me to develop and optimize my knowledge. I have experience in agile methodologies such as SCRUM. I consider myself a person with a high capacity for adaptation, friendly, responsible, and competitive.

work.name: MINISTERIO DE VIVIENDA Y EDIFICACIONES (MIVED)
work.summary: Currently, I have responsibilities such as managing the PrinterServer, preparing reports, gathering data to be processed in Excel, managing implemented software, remote assistance, among others.

work.name: FREELANCER
work.summary: I have decided to enter the freelance world offering websites, e-commerce solutions, and ERP systems developed with AppSheet, among others

work.name: MINISTERIO DE VIVIENDA Y EDIFICACIONES (MIVED)
work.summary: My responsibilities included providing assistance to institution users, hardware maintenance, installation and migration of technological equipment, and monitoring installed infrastructure.

work.name: BLUE BOX SOLUTIONS
work.summary: INTERSHIP - I performed the role of infrastructure support with the responsibilities of supervising operating systems, monitoring installed infrastructure, assisting users from different companies with computer equipment maintenance, installing and migrating equipment, providing remote technical support, etc.

projects.name: GestiOn Scarlata
projects.description: This project aims to optimize the processes of the Red Cross blood bank. We have developed an interface that allows users to access various functionalities efficiently and conveniently.

projects.name: Video to text transcriber
projects.description: I have developed a video-to-text transcriber in Python. In this project, I used the Google Translate library to efficiently transcribe the video audio. The tool automatically converts the video audio into text, facilitating the accessibility and management of multimedia content.

projects.name: Rick and Morty PAGE
projects.description: I have developed a character search tool for my favorite series, Rick and Morty, using the REACT framework. Additionally, I implemented Tailwind CSS for the first time, which allowed me to create an attractive and functional user interface.

projects.name: Ticket System EXCEL VBA
projects.description: I worked at a company that did not have a ticketing system to manage requests received via email. To improve this process, I created an application in Visual Basic that allows for tracking and generating reports on the received requests. I chose to develop it in Visual Basic to deliver it as quickly as possible and thus rapidly optimize the workflow.
